sentences.sContent: Barry held the bowls while Liz ladled soup into them.
sentences.sCn: 巴里端着碗，由利兹向碗里盛汤。

trans.tranCn: 不分对象予以赠送；以杓舀取
trans.tranOther: to put soup or other liquid food onto plates or into bowls, especially using a ladle
a large deep spoon with a long handle, used for lifting liquid food, especially soup, out of a container
